summary: This film follows two Belgrade youths on their rise to gangster legends in a decaying society.
cast: Dusan Pekic|Milan Maric|Dragan Bjelogrlic|Branka Katic|Predrag 'Miki' Manojlovic|Gorica Popovic|Vesna Trivalic|Andreja Jovanovic|Nikola Kojo|Zorka Manojlovic|Danilo 'Bata' Stojkovic|Danica Maksimovic|Radoslav 'Rale' Milenkovic|Nikola Pejakovic|Milorad Mandic-Manda|Dragan Maksimovic|Olivera Viktorovic|Dragan Zaric|Zarko Cicvaric|Jelisaveta 'Seka' Sablic|Milica Ostojic|Suzana Zlatanovic|Uros Djuric|Ljubica Savic|Gordana Les|Ivan Zivkovic|Radovan Bogojevic|Nedeljko Davidovic|Srdjan Dragojevic|Zoran Cvijanovic|Velimir 'Bata' Zivojinovic|Fedja Stojanovic
title: Rane
